verses.name: John 9:15
verses.text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight. He said unto them, He put clay upon mine eyes, and I washed, and do see.

verses.name: John 9:16
verses.text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees, This man is not of God, because he keepeth not the sabbath day. Others said, How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles? And there was a division among them.

verses.name: John 9:17
verses.text: They say unto the blind man again, What sayest thou of him, that he hath opened thine eyes? He said, He is a prophet.
